name: Chuhaister
description: A large, chaotic evil giant with thick skin and a powerful presence on the battlefield, wielding a greatclub.
memorable: Possesses unique Feybane ability against fey creatures and a reactive shield to absorb damage.
goals: To dominate in battle and protect itself and allies.
relations: May encounter fey creatures it opposes and other giants or brutish allies.
environment: Typically found in areas resonant with chaotic energy or near fey territory.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and durability, along with immunity to poison and the poisoned condition.
weaknesses: Sensitive to bright light, suffering disadvantage on attacks and perception.
attacks: Uses multiattack with a greatclub for powerful melee strikes and can hurl rocks for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Feybane, which prevents fey creatures from recovering spells nearby.
skills: Excels in Athletics with a +9 bonus, making it highly capable in physical tasks.
additional_information: Regenerates and negates damage to itself and allies with Deadfall Shield.
Effective against spellcasters, particularly those of fey origin.
Very high Strength and Constitution scores enhance its combat performance.
Imposing physical presence enhancing intimidation and battlefield control.
Can strategically use ranged attacks in combat situations.
